stdout: [0;31mfailed: [demo02] (item=httpd) => {"ansible_loop_var": "item", "changed": false, "item": "httpd", "msg": "Unable to start service httpd: Job for httpd.service failed because the control process exited with error code.\nSee \"systemctl status httpd.service\" and \"journalctl -xeu httpd.service\" for details.\n"}[0m

event_data.play: Configuración de servidor web en Oracle Linux 9
event_data.task: Asegurar que los servicios httpd y firewalld estén iniciados y habilitados

res.msg:
Unable to start service httpd: Job for httpd.service failed because the control process exited with error code.
See "systemctl status httpd.service" and "journalctl -xeu httpd.service" for details.
